title: Avengers' Jeremy Renner's custody battle worsens amid nude photo claim
text:
Jeremy and Sonni are locked in a bitter custody battle (Picture: Getty)

As Jeremy Renner’s custody battle with ex-wife Sonni Pacheco turns ugly, the Avengers star has reportedly claimed his ex shared nudes without his knowledge.

It comes after the Hawkeye star was recently accused of ‘putting a gun in his mouth and threatening to kill himself’ during a dispute, according to his ex-wife Sonni.

The two are currently locked in a bitter custody battle over their six-year-old daughter, Ava, with Canadian actress Sonni recently filing legal documents pertaining to a dispute with Jeremy.

In the latest reports, Jeremy has filed his own documents, obtained by TMZ, which claimed Sonni shared nude photos taken of the actor ‘in an attempt to embarrass and humiliate him’.

According to new legal documents, the pair exchanged nude photos of one another during their short marriage, however it’s been alleged Sonni sent uncensored photos of Jeremy’s genitals to their custody evaluator.

Jeremy has returned serve with his own legal documents (Picture: Getty Images)

It was claimed this was ‘for no other purpose than to cause me extreme embarrassment’.

The website reported the actor claimed his former partner didn’t mention to lawyers and their evaluator she, too, sent nudes that weren’t included in her documents. He also alleged she threatened to sell the pics of him to the media.

It was also alleged, among claims Sonni was ‘obsessed with Jeremy’s sex life’, that she also ‘tracked down racy internet photos of the nanny and sent those to the evaluator and his lawyers’.

The pair – who split in 2014, just months after tying the knot – share the six-year-old together, but have been disputing who will be her primary carer.

Sonni had filed for sole custody last month, and requested the Avengers actor is given monitored visits with the youngster.

According to a previous report from TMZ, 48-year-old Jeremy reportedly turned the tables, and is also asking for sole physical and legal custody. They are both expected in court on 7 November.

The latest allegations come after it was alleged by Sonni that Jeremy threatened to kill them both in a heated argument.

It’s been alleged the actor had taken drugs and was drunk when he ‘rhapsodised’ about killing Sonni, as per legal documents previously obtained by TMZ.

In documents, it was claimed in November Jeremy was at a club and ‘began talking about killing his wife, telling someone he “could not deal with her anymore, and he just wanted her gone”.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

It was also alleged their child’s nanny overheard Jeremy say he was going to kill Sonni and then himself, claiming he said ‘it was better that Ava had no parents than to have [Sonni] as a mother’.

According to the reports, ‘Jeremy put a gun in his mouth, threatened to kill himself, and fired the gun into the ceiling while Ava was asleep in her bedroom’. The Hawkeye star’s ex-wife also claimed Jeremy had a history of substance abuse as well as verbal and emotional abuse, also alleging the star left cocaine on a bathroom counter which was able to be reached by Ava.

Reps for the star responded to the recent claims, telling Metro.co.uk this week: ‘The well-being of his daughter Ava has always been and continues to be the primary focus for Jeremy.

‘This is a matter for the court to decide. It’s important to note the dramatizations made in Sonni’s declaration are a one-sided account made with a specific goal in mind.’

Jeremy and Sonni welcomed Ava together in 2013, and got married in a secret ceremony at the beginning of 2014.

The former couple previously shared parental duties, penning an agreement on child support just last year. Jeremy was originally paying Sonni $13,000 (£10,400) a month, but this will increase if his yearly income exceeds $2.3million (£1.8million).

US Weekly states the payments will not surpass $200,000 (£161,000) for the year – with this money going into an account for their daughter.
